preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 30 grams of silver using an accurate scale. 
 2. Measure out 10 grams of cerium. 
 3. Measure out 5 grams of lithium. 
 4. Measure out 80 grams of phosphorus. 
 5. Combine all measured materials in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 6. Use a mortar and pestle or mechanical mixer to thoroughly mix the powders until homogeneous.
